org.everit.osgi.dev.maven

Class AbstractEOSGiMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.everit.osgi.dev.maven.AbstractEOSGiMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnalyzeMojo, DistMojo, SyncBackMojo

    public abstract class AbstractEOSGiMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Mojos that extend this class can use the environment information defined for the plugin.

    • Field Detail

      • analyticsReferer

        @Parameter(property="eosgi.analytics.referer",
           defaultValue="eosgi-maven-plugin")
protected String analyticsReferer
        The name of the referer that means who execute goal (example: eosgi-maven-plugin or eclipse-e4-plugin, ...). Default value is "eosgi-maven-plugin".

      • analyticsWaitingTimeInMs

        @Parameter(property="eosgi.analytics.waiting.time",
           defaultValue="3000")
private long analyticsWaitingTimeInMs
        The waiting time to send the analytics to Google Analytics server.

      • artifactHandlerManager

        @Component
protected org.apache.maven.artifact.handler.manager.ArtifactHandlerManager artifactHandlerManager

      • artifactResolver

        protected PredefinedRepoArtifactResolver artifactResolver

      • environmentIdsToProcess

        @Parameter(name="environmentId",
           property="eosgi.environmentId",
           defaultValue="*")
protected String environmentIdsToProcess
        Comma separated list of the id of the environments that should be processed. Default is * that means all environments.

      • environments

        @Parameter
protected EnvironmentConfiguration[] environments
        The environments on which the tests should run.

      • environmentsToProcess

        private EnvironmentConfiguration[] environmentsToProcess

      • executedProject

        @Parameter(property="executedProject")
protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject executedProject

      • launchConfig

        @Parameter
protected LaunchConfig launchConfig
        The configuration of the launched OSGi Container.

        @Parameter(defaultValue="${mojoExecution}",
           readonly=true)
protected org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecution mojo

      • project

        @Parameter(property="project")
protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project
        The Maven project.

      • repoSession

        @Parameter(defaultValue="${repositorySystemSession}",
           readonly=true)
protected org.eclipse.aether.RepositorySystemSession repoSession
        The current repository/network configuration of Maven.

      • repoSystem

        @Component
protected org.eclipse.aether.RepositorySystem repoSystem
        The entry point to Aether, i.e. the component doing all the work.

      • settings

        @Parameter(defaultValue="${settings}",
           readonly=true)
protected org.apache.maven.settings.Settings settings

      • skipAnalytics

        @Parameter(property="eosgi.analytics.skip",
           defaultValue="false")
private boolean skipAnalytics
        Skip analytics tracking or not. That means send event statistics to Google Analytics or not. Default value is false that means send statistics.

      • convertMavenToEOSGiArtifact

        private EOSGiArtifact convertMavenToEOSGiArtifact(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact artifact)

      • createDistributableArtifactsByGAVFromProjectDeps

        protected Map<String,DistributableArtifact> createDistributableArtifactsByGAVFromProjectDeps()
        Appends the artifacts of the project to the distributable artifact map.
        Returns:
        A map where the key is the GAV and the value is the distributable artifact.

      • doExecute

        protected abstract void doExecute()
                           throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException,
                                  org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException

      • execute

        public final void execute()
                   throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException,
                          org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException

      • generateDistributableArtifactsForEnvironment

        protected Collection<DistributableArtifact> generateDistributableArtifactsForEnvironment(EnvironmentConfiguration environmentConfiguration,
                                                                                         Map<String,DistributableArtifact> projectDistributableDependencies)
                                                                                  throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Getting the processed artifacts of the project. The artifact list is calculated each time when the function is called therefore the developer should not call it inside an iteration.
        Parameters:
        environmentConfiguration - The configuration of the environment that the artifact list is generated for.
        projectDistributableDependencies - The dependencies of the project as a GAV-DistributableArtifact map.
        Returns:
        The list of dependencies that are OSGI bundles but do not have the scope "provided"
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if anything happens

      • getDefaultEnvironment

        protected EnvironmentConfiguration getDefaultEnvironment()
        Returns the default environment. This method is called when there is no environment configured for the plugin.
        Returns:
        The default environment.

      • getEnvironments

        protected EnvironmentConfiguration[] getEnvironments()
        Returns the environments that are configured for this plugin or the default environment configuration if no environments are configured.
        Returns:
        The list of environments that are defined for the plugin.

      • getEnvironmentsToProcess

        protected EnvironmentConfiguration[] getEnvironmentsToProcess()
        Getting an array of the environment configurations that should be processed based on the value of the environmentIdsToProcess parameter. The value, that is returned, is calculated the first time the function is called.
        Returns:
        The array of environment ids that should be processed.

      • processArtifact

        public DistributableArtifact processArtifact(EOSGiArtifact eosgiArtifact,
                                             File artifactFile)
        Checking if an artifact is an OSGI bundle and if yes, appends its properties. An artifact is an OSGI bundle if the MANIFEST.MF file inside contains a Bundle-SymbolicName.
        Parameters:
        eosgiArtifact - The artifact with optional additional information.
        artifactFile - The resolved file of the artifact.
        Returns:
        A DistributableArtifact with the Bundle-SymbolicName and a Bundle-Version. Bundle-Version comes from MANIFEST.MF but if Bundle-Version is not available there the default 0.0.0 version is provided.

      • putIfNotNull

        private void putIfNotNull(Map<String,String> properties,
                          String key,
                          String value)

      • resolveArtifact

        protected org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact resolveArtifact(org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact artifact)
                                                        throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Resolves an artifact so its file will be available.
        Parameters:
        artifact - The artifact that should be resolved.
        Returns:
        The Aether resolved artifact.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if something wrong happens.

        public void setEnvironmentId(String environmentId)
